name: Stranar
description:
Move - W S A D

Jump - Space bar

Teleport between platforms - Left ctrl or left mouse button

(has cooldown cca 1s)

Your mission is to collect all green cubes in this strange laboratory. They might spawn on the top and bottom platform. Avoid the red bullet hell, or you will lose all points. If these bullets hit the green cube it will be destroyed and moved to another location. This message will only be shown only once.

This is an entry to GeoJam2022

Your HUD will display after this message. You can dismiss this by pressing space

More: GITEA
